textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT: True to size, compared to standard designer sizing. * Size & Fit * Made in the USA. * Wash cold. * 99% cotton/1% polyurethane. * Fabrication: Stretch denim. * 8" rise. 32" inseam. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Born of a love for vintage denim and its Americana roots, Current / Elliott respects the history and timelessness of denim. Current / Elliott jeans blend new ideas with time-honored techniques. With its unique silhouettes, classic fits, and everlasting aesthetics, Current / Elliott delivers to its customers what they have always loved: a distinct and timeless collection that promises to love and be loved for years to come.
